subject: when and why an AssertionFails
msgSnippet: hello guys i am a new person in this field i need to know why and when an AssertionFailedError occures is it beacuse of the way we do testing or some units
messageBody:
hello guys
i am a new person in this field
i need to know why and when an AssertionFailedError occures
is it beacuse of the way we do testing or some units need not be
tested. or is it beacuse of the types of assertions we use (the wrong
assertion at the wrong place)

hoping for a very nice reply frm every one in the JUnit team
regards
Narendran
